Card - Class in model
The class Card represents a generic Uno card
Card(Card.Color, Card.Value) - Constructor for class model.Card
Card constructor with color and value field as parameter
Card(Card.Color, Card.Value, Card.Flipped) - Constructor for class model.Card
Card constructor with color and value field as parameter
Card.Color - Enum in model
The enumeration Color represents possible colors of Uno card
Card.Flipped - Enum in model
An enumeration class representing the two possible states of a card being flipped.
Card.Value - Enum in model
The enum Value represents possible values of Uno card
Card.Value.Flipped - Enum in model
An enumeration class representing the two possible states of a card being flipped.
checkLoose() - Method in class controller.Controller
Checks if the current player has lost the game.
checkUno() - Method in class controller.Controller
Checks if any player has reached UNO status (only one card remaining).
checkUno() - Method in class model.Game
Determines if the bottom player has called "UNO" before playing their last card.
clearGame() - Method in class model.Game
Clears the state of the game, including the list of players and the player IDs.
clearIds() - Static method in class model.Player
Resets the player id counter to 0.
clearTurn() - Method in class gui.PlayerPanel
Sets the shadow color of the panel back to black to indicate that it is not the player's turn.
CLOCKWISE - Enum constant in enum model.Game.GameDirection
Represents the direction of play in the UNO game.
controller - package controller
 
Controller - Class in controller
The `Controller` class acts as a mediator between the game model and the user interface.
Controller() - Constructor for class controller.Controller
 
COUNTER_CLOCKWISE - Enum constant in enum model.Game.GameDirection
Represents the direction of play in the UNO game.
createAccountList() - Method in class controller.Controller
Creates a new empty list of accounts.
createGame(Account) - Method in class controller.Controller
Creates a new game with the specified `player` as the bottom player.
